sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.QuickActionGroupSlushBucketUtility</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Fetch sys_user_group info for Quick Action Group slush bucket</description>
        <name>QuickActionGroupSlushBucketUtility</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var QuickActionGroupSlushBucketUtility = Class.create();
QuickActionGroupSlushBucketUtility.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},

    fetchGroups: function() {
        var result = [];
        var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_user_group');
        gr.addActiveQuery();
        gr.query();
        while (gr.next()) {
            result.push({
                'id': gr.getValue('sys_id'),
                'label': gr.getValue('name')
            });
        }
        return result;
    },
    getUserGroup: function() {
        var groups = this.fetchGroups();
        groups.forEach(function(group) {
            answer.add(group.id, group.label);
        });
    },

    type: 'QuickActionGroupSlushBucketUtility'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2019-03-28 18:16:59</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>3b98a654eb2033000c2c0c505206fedc</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>QuickActionGroupSlushBucketUtility</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Quick Actions" source="com.glide.quickactions">e3e6aa472f000110d8a4d5f62799b6d8</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_3b98a654eb2033000c2c0c505206fedc</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2021-08-09 10:43:23</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>723</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
